00012 SqlIdentity::SqlIdentity(QObject* parent)
00013     : QObject(parent)
00014 {

00016     _d->identity = Aki::Identity::Ptr(new Aki::Identity);

00023 bool
00024 SqlIdentity::operator==(const Aki::SqlIdentity& rhs) const
00025 {
00026     return (awayMessage() == rhs.awayMessage() &&
00027             awayNickname() == rhs.awayNickname() &&
00028             id() == rhs.id() &&
00029             isMarkLastPositionEnabled() == rhs.isMarkLastPositionEnabled() &&
00030             isMessagesEnabled() == rhs.isMessagesEnabled() &&
00031             kickMessage() == rhs.kickMessage() &&
00032             name() == rhs.name() &&
00033             partMessage() == rhs.partMessage() &&
00034             quitMessage() == rhs.quitMessage() &&
00035             realName() == rhs.realName() &&
00036             returnMessage() == rhs.returnMessage());
00037 }

00057 Aki::SqlIdentity*
00058 SqlIdentity::findIdentity(const QString& name)
00059 {
00060     if (name.isEmpty() || name.isNull()) {
00061         return 0;
00062     }
00063 
00064     QSqlQuery query;
00065     query.prepare(QLatin1String("SELECT * FROM Identity WHERE name=? LIMIT 1"));
00066     query.addBindValue(name);
00067 
00068     if (!query.exec()) {
00069         Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00070         return 0;
00071     }
00072 
00073     if (query.size() == 0) {
00074         return 0;
00075     }
00076 
00077     QSqlRecord record = query.record();
00078     const int id = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("id"));
00079     const int awayMessage = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("awayMessage"));
00080     const int awayNickname = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("awayNickname"));
00081     const int nameIndex = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("name"));
00082     const int kickMessage = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("kickMessage"));
00083     const int enableMessages = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("enableMessages"));
00084     const int markLastPosition = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("markLastPosition"));
00085     const int partMessage = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("partMessage"));
00086     const int quitMessage = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("quitMessage"));
00087     const int realName = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("realName"));
00088     const int returnMessage = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("returnMessage"));
00089 
00090     Aki::SqlIdentity* identity = new Aki::SqlIdentity;
00091 
00092     while (query.next()) {
00093         identity->setAwayMessage(query.value(awayMessage).toString());
00094         identity->setAwayNickname(query.value(awayNickname).toString());
00095         identity->setEnableMessages(query.value(enableMessages).toBool());
00096         identity->setKickMessage(query.value(kickMessage).toString());
00097         identity->setMarkLastPosition(query.value(markLastPosition).toBool());
00098         identity->setName(query.value(nameIndex).toString());
00099         identity->setPartMessage(query.value(partMessage).toString());
00100         identity->setQuitMessage(query.value(quitMessage).toString());
00101         identity->setRealName(query.value(realName).toString());
00102         identity->setReturnMessage(query.value(returnMessage).toString());
00103         identity->setId(query.value(id).toInt());
00104     }
00105 
00106     return identity;
00107 }

00115 QStringList
00116 SqlIdentity::identityNames()
00117 {
00118     QStringList names;
00119     QSqlQuery query;
00120     query.prepare(QLatin1String("SELECT name FROM Identity"));
00121 
00122     if (!query.exec()) {
00123         Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00124         return names;
00125     }
00126 
00127     QSqlRecord record = query.record();
00128     const int index = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("name"));
00129 
00130     while (query.next()) {
00131         names.append(query.value(index).toString());
00132     }
00133 
00134     return names;
00135 }

00161 Aki::SqlIdentity*
00162 SqlIdentity::newIdentity(const QString& name)
00163 {
00164     QString tmp;
00165     KUser user(KUser::UseRealUserID);
00166 
00167     if (user.property(KUser::FullName).isNull()) {
00168         tmp = QLatin1String("Aki");
00169     } else {
00170         tmp = user.property(KUser::FullName).toString();
00171     }
00172 
00173     QScopedPointer<Aki::SqlIdentity> identity(new Aki::SqlIdentity);
00174     identity->setAwayMessage(QLatin1String("I'm now away"));
00175     identity->setAwayNickname(user.loginName() + QLatin1String("|away"));
00176     identity->setEnableMessages(false);
00177     identity->setKickMessage(QString());
00178     identity->setMarkLastPosition(false);
00179     identity->setName(name);
00180     identity->setPartMessage(QLatin1String("Aki IRC Client %v"));
00181     identity->setQuitMessage(QLatin1String("Aki IRC Client %v"));
00182     identity->setRealName(tmp);
00183     identity->setReturnMessage(QLatin1String("I'm now back"));
00184 
00185     QSqlQuery query;
00186     query.prepare(QLatin1String("INSERT INTO Identity (awayMessage,awayNickname,name,kickMessage,enableMessages,\n"
00187                                 "markLastPosition,partMessage,quitMessage,realName,returnMessage)\n"
00188                                 "VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)"));
00189     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(identity->awayMessage()));
00190     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(identity->awayNickname()));
00191     query.addBindValue(identity->name());
00192     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(identity->kickMessage()));
00193     query.addBindValue(identity->isMessagesEnabled());
00194     query.addBindValue(identity->isMarkLastPositionEnabled());
00195     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(identity->partMessage()));
00196     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(identity->quitMessage()));
00197     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(identity->realName()));
00198     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(identity->returnMessage()));
00199 
00200     if (!query.exec()) {
00201         Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00202         return 0;
00203     }
00204 
00205     identity->setId(query.lastInsertId().toInt());
00206 
00207     return identity.take();
00208 }

00294 bool
00295 SqlIdentity::save()
00296 {
00297     QSqlQuery query;
00298     const QString str = QLatin1String("UPDATE Identity SET awayMessage=?, awayNickname=?, name=?, kickMessage=?, enableMessages=?"
00299                                       ", markLastPosition=?, partMessage=?, quitMessage=?, realName=?, returnMessage=? WHERE id=?");
00300     query.prepare(str);
00301     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(awayMessage()));
00302     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(awayNickname()));
00303     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(name()));
00304     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(kickMessage()));
00305     query.addBindValue(isMessagesEnabled());
00306     query.addBindValue(isMarkLastPositionEnabled());
00307     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(partMessage()));
00308     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(quitMessage()));
00309     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(realName()));
00310     query.addBindValue(Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkString(returnMessage()));
00311     query.addBindValue(id());
00312 
00313     if (!query.exec()) {
00314         Aki::SqlIdentityPrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00315         return false;
00316     }
00317 
00318     return true;
00319 }
